content: PLC 600 Layout tablet Layout tool controller with fast computing power and 10” screen, for jobsite stake-out, surveying and BIM-to-Field layout using all Hilti advanced layout tools ### Categories: Home > Products > Measuring tools & scanners > Tablets and controllers- - - ### FEATURES:Features Built for BIM – powerful processor and detailed 10” screen so you can work faster, with more complex files and with larger numbers of points Save labor, build faster – transition from slow, labor-intensive traditional methods to efficient digital layout with the PLC 600 Built tough – IP65 dust/water-resistance, sunlight-readable display and full-day battery life make this layout system suitable for real jobsite conditions Bluetooth®, 4G LTE and WiFi connectivity – for more reliable data exchange from virtually anywhere User support available – remote assistance and clever accessories help you maximize the benefit from your advanced layout tools Applications Layout of 2D and 3D points and lines directly from CAD and BIM data Transferring heights in flat-plane, single-slope or dual-slope mode Measuring existing features and performing as-built measurements for documentation Compatible with the PLT 300 layout tool, as well as POS 150 and POS 180 robotic total stations ### TECHNICAL DATA: IP protection class: IP 65 (EN 60529) Maximum operating time: 10 h Battery type: Li-Ion Technical Data | IP protection class | IP 65 (EN 60529) | Maximum operating time | 10 h | Battery type | Li-Ion | Charging time | 4.5 h | Operating temperature range | -20.2 - 140 °F ### ITEMS- 3777305 - PLC 600 Tablet Combo - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x POA 134 Battery charger - 1x PLC 600 Controller - 1x POA 41 Battery - 1x USA/CND Supply cord - 1x Sleeve - 1x Tablet holder assy - 1x Construction Layout Premium
